content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Virtual Network Sensor supports Hyper-V deployment September 28, 2023—The Virtual Network Sensor now supports deployment on Hyper-V host systems. For more information, see Deploy a Virtual Network Sensor with Hyper-V. Network Security → Network Inventory © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base

metadata.title: Virtual Network Sensor supports Hyper-V deployment
